data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=s3u25pu8GQ8Q7kNvgE2ZHRm&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDp47Uxc4I7Cgao2oW2Fgdncztvwr_iu_oRgYwnhoZEsg&oe=66531B37)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=k_09-O0xjr8Q7kNvgFKN2Oq&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDpCaluo40uf-4ZlxkAbP-xZX19sRrinlMg23ZOnI-OTw&oe=665328D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Pxx67s5kHd4Q7kNvgEj_bLy&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDUH6vJ2kb7I_a-DxmcrQxy8b2jv_0qVHTrkeTwMM_k_w&oe=66532C50)
